name: MaculaExamination
title: Macula examination
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes concepts related to examination of the macula.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Encounter, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes relevant concepts associated with examination of the macula.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Dilated macular exam performed, including documentation of the presence or absence of macular thickening or hemorrhage and the level of macular degeneration severity (EC)
Dilated fundus evaluation performed within 12 months prior to cataract surgery (EC)
Dilated macular or fundus exam performed, including documentation of the presence or absence of macular edema and level of severity of retinopathy (EC)

contains.display: Dilated macular exam performed, including documentation of the presence or absence of macular thickening or hemorrhage and the level of macular degeneration severity (EC)
Dilated fundus evaluation performed within 12 months prior to cataract surgery (EC)
Dilated macular or fundus exam performed, including documentation of the presence or absence of macular edema and level of severity of retinopathy (EC)
